10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_DISPATCH_HPP
11#define VSIP_CORE_DISPATCH_HPP
12
13#include <vsip/core/dispatch_tags.hpp>
14#include <vsip_csl/c++0x.hpp>
15
16namespace vsip_csl
17{
18namespace dispatcher
19{
20
21/// Define the operation-specific Evaluator signature.
22template <typename O, typename R = void> 
23struct Signature
24{
25  // The default signature is useful for a compile-time check only,
26  // as there are no arguments to inspect at runtime.
27  typedef R(type)();
28};
29
30
31/// An Evaluator determines whether an Operation can be performed
32/// with a particular backend.
33///
34/// Template parameters:
35///   :O: Operation tag
36///   :B: Backend tag
37///   :S: Signature
38///   :E: Enable (SFINAE) check.
39template <typename O,
40          typename B,
41          typename S = typename Signature<O>::type,
42	  typename E = void>
43struct Evaluator
44{
45  static bool const ct_valid = false;
46};
47
48
49} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
50} // namespace vsip_csl
51
52namespace vsip
53{
54namespace impl
55{
56namespace dispatcher = vsip_csl::dispatcher;
57}
58}
59
60#endif // VSIP_CORE_DISPATCH_HPP
